snippet: This exhibition at Discovery Times Square, packed with movie costumes, props and activities, puts Peeta Mellark squarely in the friend zone.
abstract: Discovery Times Square opens exhibition dedicated to Hunger Games, movie series about dystopian society that promotes annual deadly contest; The Hunger Games: The Exhibition offers movie costumes and props, interactive kiosks and activities in maze of seven galleries.
lead_paragraph: This exhibition at Discovery Times Square, packed with movie costumes, props and activities, puts Peeta Mellark squarely in the friend zone.

headline.main: ‘The Hunger Games: The Exhibition’ Allows Kids to Express Their Inner Katniss
headline.print_headline: An Arena for Kids, No Bow and Arrow Required
